definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Question-posing should have an epistemological base as its internal structural support.
sentences.chinese: 问题的提出需要有一种知识论基础作为内在结构支撑。

sentences.english: Lakatos' theory of knowledge is among the best epistemological theories today.
sentences.chinese: 拉卡托斯的知识论是目前最优秀的知识理论之一。

sentences.english: Kant developed the research on theory of knowledge into higher stage.
sentences.chinese: 而康德把知识论的探究推进到了更高的层次。

sentences.english: Locke's theory of knowledge runs through the thread of the truthfulness of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 洛克知识论贯穿知识确实性主线。

sentences.english: The nature of history is one the basic problems in historic knowledge system.
sentences.chinese: 历史的性质是史学知识论的基本问题之一。

sentences.english: Second, I will sort out kinds of epistemologies of moral belief.
sentences.chinese: 接著，我将要挑出多种的道德信念知识论。

definition: epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
